module.p:
neo- is a prefix used to create negative compound adjectives from other adjectives.
crìoch fem. (pl. crìochan) end, boundary ⇒ crìoch(n)ach finite ⇒ neo-chrìoch(n)ach infinite
gnàth
custom, practice, habit, usage, convention ⇒ gnàthach customary, normal, usual, habitual, routine ⇒ neo-ghnàthach unusual, unconventional, unorthodox, uncommon
